topic.body:
Ergün Poyraz in his 2007 book Children of Moses, wrote that Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, and his wife, are crypto-Jews, who secretly work with the Israeli intelligence Mossad.
Erdogan has spoken to the Jewish Anti-Defamation League and the American Jewish Committee and the American Jewish Congress handled to Erdogan a Jewish ‘profiles of courage award’.
Turkey has a large crypto-Jewish population according to Poyraz.
http://www.inspiretochangeworld.com/2015/11/turkey-president-erdogan-is-a-jewish-president/
http://www.meforum.org/5221/turkey-crypto-jew
http://smoloko.com/?p=8800

In 2007, Poyraz was arrested and eventually sentenced to 29 years in prison.
Poyraz claims that Erdoğan came to power as part of a Zionist Jewish conspiracy devised by Turkey’s JİTEM, a secret government intelligence unit.
topic.title: Erdogan is Jewish and is working for the International Jewry
